segments.text: What is that you have there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Aah ! Close your eyes . You aren't supposed to see this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ha ! I caught you . Just let me peek . I won't tell anyone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can't peek ! This is a surprise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's one little hint . If you don't go out right now , this won't be under the tree .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And please shut the door and lock it behind you !
segments.speaker: S2
